ActionEmail.name: Incident Notification to a Workgroup
ActionEmail.description: This action informs a team that a ticket has been assigned their workgroup
ActionEmail.to: SELECT bizTeam AS t JOIN bizWorkgroup AS w ON w.team_id = t.id WHERE w.id=:this->workgroup_id
ActionEmail.subject: The ticket $this->name()$, severity $this->severity$ has been assigned to the workgroup $this->workgroup_name$
ActionEmail.body:
The incident ticket $this->name()$ has been assigned to the workgroup $this->workgroup_name$.

Description: $this->title$

Initial Situation: $this->initial_situation$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink()$

ActionEmail.name: Incident notification to Agent
ActionEmail.description: This action informs an agent that a ticket has been assigned to her/him
ActionEmail.subject: The ticket $this->name()$, severity $this->severity$ has been assigned to you
ActionEmail.body:
The incident ticket $this->name()$ has been assigned to you.

Description: $this->title$

Initial Situation: $this->initial_situation$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink()$

ActionEmail.name: Incident Notification to caller
ActionEmail.description: This action is used to inform the caller
ActionEmail.subject: Ticket $this->name()$, severity $this->severity$ - $this->ticket_status$
ActionEmail.body:
The incident ticket $this->name()$ has changed to status $this->ticket_status$

Current situation: $this->current_situation$

Last update: $this->last_update$

for more information on this ticket, click here: $this->hyperlink()$
